[Cf. Pers. lūt ʻ naked ʼ, Kurd. rūt. -- Similar word -- groups s.vv. *latta -- 1, *litta -- , *luṭṭa -- 1: see list s.v. *lakka -- 1. -- Cf. a similar group for ʻ lump ʼ s.v. *lōttha -- 3]
K. lath, dat. lüċü f. ʻ slender woman ʼ, lọ̆tu ʻ trivial, frivolous, easy to manage or endure, mild, soft, slow ʼ (LM 397 wrongly < laghú -- );
N. luto ʻ small weakly boy ʼ, lute ʻ weakling ʼ, lutyāhā ʻ weak and worthless fellow ʼ.
